title: SENSATE
oneLiner: The intersection of science, technology and sound has given rise to new and groundbreaking ways to care for our health. As more individuals today understand the need for self-care, technological innovation opens new possibilities of the ways to do so.

section.text: Kinda Lab | We explored how Sensate, a new wellbeing technology using sound, infrasonics and resonance which stimulates the #vagusnerve can support new at-home wellbeing rituals. We dug into the impact of Sensateâ€™s vibratory and sonic elements using EEG and Heart Rate measures, as well its impact over a 3-week period of daily use. In 30 participants, Sensate became an easy new #ritual to integrate into daily lives. In only 10 minutes a day, and with no prior experience required, it offered deep states of relaxation similar to that of long term meditators, reduced stress and was simple to use.
Kinda Studios Research team: | katherine Templar Lewis | Robyn Landau | Heenie Lee | Mirko Febbo
